website_summaries.verdict: It's hard to find a better performing machine in this price range.
pros: Incredibly affordable for the quality and performance it offers
Provides a generous selection of sewing functions for users of all abilities
cons: Has a difficult time threading through thicker fabric

customer_reviews.title: Great New Brother Machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my older Brother SE400. This new model embroiders really nicely and is easy to use. I love that it has a port for a memory stick so you can easily load any pattern or name. I use Amazing Designs lettering software because I mostly embroider names. I can easily use the Amazing Designs software to create a name then just transfer it via the memory stick to the new Brother Embroidery machine. The older models have a similar feature but you have to use a cord to transfer the designs, which was difficult since my computer was in a different room.
customer_reviews.author: Beth CochranTop Contributor: Fashion Design

customer_reviews.title: Love this Machine!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this machine! I've only used it for embroidering so far, but it does a great job, and is easy to use for a beginnner like me. Color screen feature is great. Instruction manual is very helpful and easy to understand! The threading feature is also very nice and a lot better than the previous model with the cassette threader (couple more steps, but it works every time)!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Beware Systemic Brother Issue
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this model specifically to replace my beloved CS6000i as I am an avid quilter. Unfortunately, after just a few test stitches were tried, the machine began providing an error message that the needle is bent or there is a thread tangle. Regardless of attempts to service (tried every provided needle and no thread tangle) the machine stopped sewing. This seems like a systemic Brother issue as this is why I replaced my previous machine. I have returned this model and ordered a Singer Quantum instead with an extended warranty and a ton more for the money in means of stitch options and speed.
customer_reviews.author: Quiltsexpress

customer_reviews.title: In love with this machine
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this machine! I'm a 90% stay at home mother and needed a hobby so my husband bought this for me, I own another brother but wanted to try and dabble with embroidery and I love it, you'll want to read the manual I read the beginning and scanned the other parts just to get used to the machine, obviously I'll have to re read most of it but I've already made a baby quilt, multiple things with names as well. Very easy to use once the manual is read.
customer_reviews.author: Aliza

customer_reviews.title: and I love it. It is really quiet
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about a month, and I love it. It is really quiet, and very easy to use. I have only used it for sewing so far, but my daughters boyfriend had it embroidering the day we got it, he made a few designs that looked nice.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: Such a easy machine to learn and great for beginners! I would also recommend buying the Initial Stitch software along with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Love the machine but it is broken...
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to buy this machine I was anxious to try it but after just couple of attempts I was very upset,I constantly have to rethread after just few stitches because the thread is ripping and the machine stops giving me the error message... Not only that I have to rethread numerous times and it takes me forever to finish a small project but also it is missing few stitches at every error so the project ends up with some holes. Also at the end I noticed that the back looked bad with the thread tangled in many places I think I will return it...I wish I could fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Annabella

customer_reviews.title: LEMON!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! First of all it did not come with all the accessories. Mine came with no extra feet attachments. I was on the phone with support for quite some time to verify my purchases, etc. Still have not received my accessories. Now my LCD screen is not working... Really wish I had not purchased this machine. If you read the reviews it looks like many lemons were produced. Not reliable at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lister

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this sewing-embrodiery machine. It has so many features that I have on my Babylock Symphony machine that cost over 6x as much as I paid through Amazon Prime. Some of the features are: an automatic threader that actually works everytime, thread cutter, stop-start dial, and a sliding dial to increase or decrease sewing speed. It also has a handle.making it easy to carry. I highly reccommend this machine for anyone looking for a low price machine..
customer_reviews.author: Janice Hardy

customer_reviews.title: 1st and 2 nd one does not work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this machine. Auto matic threading is broken and does not work. I returned it and got another one. Again same thing. Broken does not work automatic threader Returning the second one want a refund Bad produce and bad patent
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: No presser foot tension adjustment!
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using this machine, I liked the way it sewed and was impressed by all the features. Unfortunately, when I attempted to sew some elastic tape, the tape got pulled into the feeder no matter what I tried. I wanted to decrease the pressure applied by the foot, but for some reason this machine doesn't seem to have that capability. I'm very frustrated right now. I sent an email to customer support and will update this review if they are able to resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: PlasticRN

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR BEGINNERS!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is much more complicated than I thought. It is not for beginners. I bought it to do monogramming, but the fonts were much too plain, even for a shirt cuff. Not much selection at all on letter fonts. This machine takes more time and patience than I have—and I am retired!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: This brotherSE600 sewing/embroidery machine is a gem!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased brotherSE600 because my brotherSE400 was a great fit for me to use--so I was already familiar with brother sewing machines. It arrived just in time for me to spend my lock-down time in making quilt tops and learning how to use the embroidery attachment. I also purchased USB pes 291,000 embroidery designs and I have made at least 100 of these designs and I still have more designs to explore! I have been in quilting/sewing heaven and I highly recommend purchasing brotherSE600 combo sewing/embroidery machine if you are looking for a beginner embroidery machine. I love this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Janene Stott

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I received a used product?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this is typical but my machine did not come with the embroidery presser foot! It's an embroidery machine so I'm not sure how that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great Sewing Machine... Horible Embrodery Software!
customer_reviews.text: The sewing machine hardware is state of the art in both quality and functionality. Unfortunatly the software that drives the embrodery side of the machine is a negative 1 on the 10 scale. My impression of the machine is when Brother aknowledges Wilcom Hatch as the worldwide defacto standard in embrodery conversions and allows their conversions to run on their machines without voiding the warranty, then maybe we can start to see the true potential of what an at home sewing and embrodery machine can become for the people who purchase them. I was very appreciative of Amazon for allowing me to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: No Customer Service at ALL
customer_reviews.text: After a week using it I got a error no detecting the thread. I read the manual , forums ,and the brother website with no luck. I try to call customer services, and after waiting form more than an hour no representative pick up the phone. I do not recommend this brand , after you buy it you are in your own.
customer_reviews.author: Juli

customer_reviews.title: Brother isn't the product it use to be.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this machine... now Extremely disappointed. I have less then 10 hours of sewing on this machine and now its locked up with an error message. Now to figure out how to get this fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely machine
customer_reviews.text: Step learning curve on bobbin. My biggest compliant, and there are very few, is the bobbin feed tends to catch below the spindle. There is no way to take the platform off so you get stuck fishing it off with a seam ripper. My other compliant is just seating and threading the bobbin. The numbered steps are bit misleading. Steps 7 and 8 cause more issues than it helps. My biggest worry is the bobbin cover will break since it is a bit thin. I haven't tried the embroidery yet, but I am hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: M. Albanese

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: My first one was defective and kept Messing up but AMAZON replaced it and the second one is perfect I use it all day every day. I use the embroidery setting. I did try the sewing machine setting and it sewed very accurate and smoothly however u can not sew backwards on this machine and make of My protects require back and forth sewing so I just use a different machine for sewing All in all I love my machine it was easy to learn and Brother customer and technical support is always there to help you! I can’t wait until I can get a larger machine with a larger hoop!.
customer_reviews.author: Nola Jackie

customer_reviews.title: A well built machine with a zero fail rate
customer_reviews.text: ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️ I wanted to wait awhile to review this to fully give you an accurate review and it comes down to this: The machine does everything it suppose to do perfectly. From setup to actual performance it is simply flawless. Perhaps the best machine of any we owned. The screen is a big bonus and the designs are amazing. A very good product overall and fully recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Chris X

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this is a great machine, and I’ll update this review once Brother sends me the 7 presser feet (which I was told are back ordered for several weeks), 3 pre wound bobbins and bobbin clip. The Rep on the phone took all of my information then sent an email asking for ALL of the same information again! I spent over an hour fiddling with this. Really annoying
customer_reviews.author: patwis

customer_reviews.title: I love this new machine.  I have had many others, but preforms better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I have used the embroidery unit, it takes time to figure it out, but works well. Stitches are professional on the embroidery. Have used the sewing machine and it works well, stitches are good, used it for piecing a quilt, then quilting it with the walking foot that I purchased from Amazon, worked well and had a very pleasing product when complete. I would recommend this machine very highly as long as you reference the manual. Wanted to add that the machine has the best threader that I have ever used. Easy to use, works "every" time.
customer_reviews.author: Karen, Kenosha

customer_reviews.title: Missing feet
customer_reviews.text: I got this machine for Christmas and got ready to use it to see that all the feet were missing. I watched a video online showing where it should be right on top in a white pouch and it's not there. I tried calling Brother but was on hold for 30 minutes. I emailed them and hope to hear something back soon. I did just see on the reviews that there are others who had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy mcknight

customer_reviews.title: DID'NT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I paid three hundred and fifty-five dollars just to have this machine arrive broken and I even contacted brother and they gave me solutions but nothing work and when they suggested that I bring it to an authorized brother repairman. I said no because I paid for a machine that "was like new" not even to mention that it didn't even come with any sewing needles. Needless to say, I'm extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith kohlstock

customer_reviews.title: Im totally in love!
customer_reviews.text: I order this model because of other reviews stating how easy it is to learn. They are right, I was able to skim the manual, watch a few specialty youtube videos and have been full speed ever since. I have only been using it for 3 days and have completed over a dozen projects only using the built-in settings. I have not even gotten to transferring images from my computer yet. I definitely recommend this to any other beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new machine to replace my old Singer and this one caught my eye. I love that it gives you the ability to do custom embroidery but its definitely a learning curve. Great product for the price. My one issue is that if you want to do custom embroidery you'll have to dish out some money to purchase a design program. If Brother would include a free beginners embroidery program with purchase it would deff be worthy of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Martyna K

customer_reviews.title: knowledge of sewing
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review even though I returned the machine. I never used it. Watched some videos on what to expect with it, price of thread and extra things an embroidery enthusiast would use it for. I don't think it was a good choice for me. I just don't have patience or the budget for it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Mikkelson

customer_reviews.title: Great sewing machine
customer_reviews.text: I have had this machine for a little over a month. At first I wasn't too happy with it but once I got to know how to use it, I love it. My biggest complaint it that the needle threader doesn't work. It worked the first 3-4 times and hasn't worked since. I have already made a quilt with this machine and finished two other quilts that I had been working on for years. I haven't used the embroidery part of the machine yet so I can't comment on how that works.
customer_reviews.author: mjmoore4

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Have been sewing for years and have wanted one for years BUT this was aggravating to use...watched numerous videos on youtube and read book but was too easy to grab stabilizer on back while embroidering...so sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Suzy McCray

customer_reviews.title: Cheap , embroidery is about 3x2 max
customer_reviews.text: The machine is decent. You can embroider a space more like 3x2. If you plan on embroidering , your gonna have to fork over about $350 for the software . everything on the machine is plastic and cheap . the touch display works but the push buttons on the front hardly register . very dissipointed
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Brother comes through with a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I pulled out a 55-year-old Singer to make pandemic masks. Into my second one it broke. Everybody closed and no ability to see if it could even be repaired. Lots of research brought up the Brother SE600 on many favorite lists. I had to wait through the back order and slower-than-usual "pandemic delivery" but it was worth the wait. What a quiet machine. Lovely selection of stitches. Easy to fill the bobbin and thread the machine, with on-machine instructions. One con: It came with several accessories, but not the ones I would find more beneficial, such as the embroidery presser foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey with issues
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my mother and we have been disappointed with the quality of the machine. It is a rather expensive machine and would have expected it to be better built for the money. It has a ton of features and can do a lot, but small things have broken in the first few months. Something is always getting jammed, or feet breaking, or needles breaking. We have always been able to fix the issues, but her prior machine lasted about 30 years. I'm not sure we will get 30 years out of this model.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: For beginners and pros alike
customer_reviews.text: I got this sewing machine after not having one for over ten years. I guess that makes me a beginner all over again. This sewing machine just made me fall in love the second I turned it on. The display is crisp and intuitive, embroidery comes out beautifully and the sewing process is so much easier than I was used to from my previous machine. I can only recommend this one. Just make sure to buy high qulaity thread, as I experienced some skipped stitches because of the low quality one that I initially bought. As soon as I put the better thread in, skipped stitches were a thing of the past.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle-Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Great little combo machine
customer_reviews.text: I've been sewing for over 40 years and embroidery for about 20. I'd sold my machines a while back because I didn't have time and didn't have space to store them. I bought this one just before Christmas as an early gift for myself. I absolutely love, love, love it. Winding a bobbin is "sew" much easier on this than it was on previous machines. If you can only have 1 machine but want to sew AND embroider, this is a great choice. Enough options but not so many that it's overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: MzOnPointPromo

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful machine. I had an SE400 which I broke by being careless with a basting needle (which lucky for me still sews as a regular machine). This is definitely an upgrade from that machine. Very happy with the upload of your own patterns from the computer, although it does take some practice and patience to get that right. I purchased a CD with thousands of designs from Ebay and while not all of them work because this is only a 4x4 field, it does what it says it will do and has very nice additional sewing stitches for my quilting projects. Quality machine.
customer_reviews.author: SallyF

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: I have always only used Singer brand sewing machines, but when I was looking for an embroidery machine, this one stood out to me. I am absolutely loving it! The sewing runs smoother than my Singer did. Everything is so easy, from winding the bobbin to threading the needle. There has been a learning curve, but it didn't take long to figure out how to use all the amazing features. I would definitely recommend this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great For New to Machine Embroidery
customer_reviews.text: I loved my Project Runway NS-40 but wanted to try some new stitches and embroidery. I was a little nervous about the embroidery - I thought it might be too complicated or only work well on a very expensive machine. I selected this one after researching both on Amazon and at the Brother site. It turned out to be just what I wanted. I read the manual, watches a few utube videos, and was embroidering in a couple hours. I haven’t tried everything yet - I only received it and set it up today. But at this point, I’m very satisfied with the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: WalkerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Fun little machine, I'm having a blast
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Brother machine and though there is a learning curve (who knew there's a secret handshake winding bobbins?? I was floored, I know, I know read the directions, duh me) After owning and running Singer and Kenmore machines for 40+ years, some things are ingrained habits, that's on me, NOT the machine. It is a fun little machine, I've never machined embroidered and this will walk you right through that (and youtube is very helpful for those of us that are visual learners) I got mine on sale about $50 less than is listed now, so I would recommend waiting on a sale on Amazon, use the extra saved to get thread and stabilizer.
customer_reviews.author: TLRT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first embroidery machine. I did not know anything about sewing or embroidery, but in less than a week I now know how to use this machine. It is VERY EASY and FRIENDLY to use. Even if you don't know anything about it. I definitely recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Moi C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Machine For The Money
customer_reviews.text: An excellent machine to sew or embroider with. Very happy with features that make sewing easier. This machine is great for someone just getting started with embroidery. Easy to follow instruction manual. Nice set of attachments included. Runs smooth and quiet. Fully meets my expectations. Gave 4 stars on durability/ material quality because plastic is used where machines of the past used metal. Overall I'm very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable Embroidery/Sewing machine For Patches
customer_reviews.text: I like how fast you can take the machine out and set up, to start embroidering. If you never have sewn before it might be a little confusing but after watching some YouTube videos I was well on my way to Embroidering. I use this machine to make patches. would recommend this Brother Se 600
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to open your wallet.
customer_reviews.text: You will need to purchase programs for this machine, for key features.
customer_reviews.author: DOLL BABY

customer_reviews.title: Works surprisingly well once you know how to use it
customer_reviews.text: The 4x4 embroidery area is more than enough space to embroider most things - shirts, pillows, patches, etc. This machine can make HIGH quality embroidered items, but using the right software makes all of the difference. While a machine this size is a good deal at its price, you're going to want to get high quality digitizing/design software to really use it to its fullest extent, and that can cost $$$$. I would definitely recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hazelett

customer_reviews.title: Requires determination!!
customer_reviews.text: Love having a machine that sews, quilts and embroidery. Being a novice it's a learning process. For me it requires time and patience but i am getting the nitch and enjoying the process. Had to replace needle threader in about 5 weeks in glad to have had a warranty. I have no negative complaints but having to learn millimeter vs. Inches don't like that. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine
customer_reviews.text: I have use this for a month and once you figure out The rudiments It is a very nice machine for the money. It is a very nice machine for the money I am extremely impressed with its capabilities features and overall performance . The only thing I wished is if you could speed up and slow down the embroidery is ditching The only thing I wished is if you could control the embroidery stitching speed And it would be nice if it was a little bit faster. Buy two of them that's a good way to get around it
customer_reviews.author: NWMI

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sewing machine!
customer_reviews.text: I got the sewing machine to replace my 30 two-year-old one that stop going in reverse. It's an excellent machine, I haven't had the opportunity to try out the embroidery yet.
customer_reviews.author: Lark626

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beginner hobbyist!
customer_reviews.text: From light sewing to light weight crafts this machine has been great. The embroidery function allows you to personalize everything from tshirts to pillow cases. I've pieced quilt tops and embroidered towels. Not quite strong enough to quilt through batting and assemble medium to thick quilts but that's not what this machine is design for. It's for smaller crafts and light sewing and does that very well.
customer_reviews.author: The Robinsons

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and so far pretty easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Couple hours I was sewing up a storm. First time I have had an embroidery machine. I did learn it is easier to leave light thread in the bobbin and just keep changing the top thread as instructed. I also learned I should buy thread consistent with the brother numbering system so I have the right colors to see the patterns already on the machine. No big deal tho in the end
customer_reviews.author: HappyQuilter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Have never had an embroidery machine and I am enjoying it very much. I have no complaints whatsoever. I use it constantly as I make and sell fabric throws and baby blankets and have not one complaint. The embroidery attachment is simple to use and I love sitting down to this machine each day. The price is extremely reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Magliocca

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware-doesn’t work well. Only a month to return-problems start after
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Couldn’t even complete three projects without either ruining the needle, or it jamming up. Past the return date of a month, so now stuck with junk. Stay away from this machine if you actually want to complete projects.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value
customer_reviews.text: I have had this machine about 6 months and I couldn't be happier. It works very well for both straight sewing and embroidery. The embroidery side is superb to other machines I have tried over the years. It is very easy to get designs off of internet sites and load them on the machine with appropriate software on your computer.
customer_reviews.author: K Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING for personalizing gifts
customer_reviews.text: Finally caved in and bought a new sewing machine (with embroidery). Absolutely love this machine and all it can do. Have added names to my lab coats, have sewn and personalized face masks, etc. Love the way the machine will thread the needle for you, how easy it is to sew, and how the embroidery is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bio Grl

customer_reviews.title: Its given me dreams of hope.
customer_reviews.text: I have falling in love with this machine. After returning the first one. I even named it Emily. She has taken away my lonely hours into a constructive happy time. Would I recommend this machine absolutely without hesitation. I give it a ten star if they go that high. I made the flowers above and framed it. Came out beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Ahoug

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and understand
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine both for normal sewing and embroidery. I have a very small area where I can do my sewing and this machine is ideal. Brother needle threaders in my opinion are the best. what else can I say it will be my companion for years to come. I am in the UK and ordered this on a Tuesday and received it the following Tuesday, that was standard post It did cost me £390.26 including shipping and import taxes. I also had to buy a Step Down Voltage Converter, 230/240 Volts down to 110/120 Volts. The nearest machine to this in the UK costs £899.
customer_reviews.author: Jani

customer_reviews.title: Thread slips out constantly. Hand. Thread tangles
customer_reviews.text: I keep having to stop and retread it as it keeps slipping out. When winding it gets tangled and while embroidering it gets jammed. Literally problem after problem. You have no idea how upset I am over this. I’ve planned for months getting this machine and when I finally spent my hard earned dollar on it, I have nothing but trouble. Waste of money. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Cates

customer_reviews.title: Missing accessories, but great machine
customer_reviews.text: This is my first sewing machine and it was fairly easy to learn along with the help of a couple YouTube videos. Although I have only used it for a few basic items. (Baby clothes, scrunchies, head warmer) Check your box though! I did not receive all of the accessories that were suppose to come with it and buying all of them separately adds up!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This sewing machine is a great value. I did take a class at the local fabric store to learn how to use it as my old machine is 35 years old. However, the book and Youtube would be very adequate to learn how to use it. I have been very happy with this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn and works great
customer_reviews.text: My first sewing/ embroidery machine and with the help of YouTube, it has been very easy to learn how to use. The touch screen also has an option that will show you how to do what as well. I have both sewed and embroidered and I love it so far. I would recommend to first timers. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jecka

customer_reviews.title: Great sewing machine
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is machine doesn't allow you to use all the space for embroidery
customer_reviews.author: Jeaniene B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect machine for me and the projects I wanted to fo.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is very easy to operate. Great for beginners like myself. I made my sisters "dads shirt pillows" that I was able to monogram too. The projects came out wonderful, I was very proud. Would deffinately reccomend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: CCTN

customer_reviews.title: Started great then rapidly declining!
customer_reviews.text: Less than two months after purchase and we (this was a gift for my wife) are having software issues on embroidery part of machine. Brother keeps bankers hours for customer service, BTW! That alone cost them *! If we’ve got to send it back....well we’ll see!
customer_reviews.author: Ajax

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't power up used 6 times
customer_reviews.text: After about 6 times using it now it doesn't power up. I've tried different outlets so that's not the problem
customer_reviews.author: kevin coffey

customer_reviews.title: Brother SE600
customer_reviews.text: The written instructions were not detailed enough. I have been sewing for approximately 40 years and it was a Kenmore. I am now 72 years old and this machine beat me and my abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Pennygirl1

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this machine! I bought it for personal use as well as for creating crafts to sell. Reading the manual is a must! I still refer to it frequently. It's fairly easy to use once you read all the directions. It took a few tries to get the embroidery just right but once I did it worked perfectly. I highly recommend this machine!
customer_reviews.author: B. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine
customer_reviews.text: I love my new brother sewing machine. It has many features that make it easier on beginners. Easy to learn on and cost a fraction of the price other big brand names cost with less features. Haven't tried out the embroidery yet on it.
customer_reviews.author: F Brazeau

customer_reviews.text: I like the machine, except I can’t seem to get it to run using the pressure foot. I have tried everything they say to do do, but still can’t use it. I would like to be able to have more control of the speed when sewing.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine for all Projects!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for any craft lover! I recommend this product for anyone wanting to add a do all sewing machine to their craft room. It was very easy to use although not recommended for beginners! I 10/10 recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great starter machine
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best investments I’ve ever made..not only does it allow me to create and manifest my ideas but it saves me money also not having to buy expensive brands. I can wear my own style! Wish it could embroider hats but it’s awesome nonetheless
customer_reviews.author: Bumesato

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine, on screen directions for threading, etc
customer_reviews.text: Very nice machine, for someone not sewing in 50 years
customer_reviews.author: nellsmom

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t sold in over 20 years, and decided that I would get an embroider plus machine and I’m very happy I did I love this way that this machine sows this machine sews.
customer_reviews.author: nana

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and clean sewing
customer_reviews.text: Love my new sewing machine! Sews super smooth compared to my old machine. The embroidery function is awesome and fun to use. Easier to figure out than I expected. Love the needle up and down, thread cutter, and automatic needle threader! I’m a beginner and it has so many extras that I will have fun figuring out.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Brother Se600
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sewing machine to replace a Pfaff that I have had for over 25 years. Love the way the bobbin goes in. Incredibly easy to thread and love the self threading needle option. Finished a baptismal gown for a friend. Haven't had a chance yet to try the embroidery. But very excited to do that in the near future
customer_reviews.author: Kate Zimm

customer_reviews.title: Easy machine for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this machine! This machine met my price point for all the features I wanted. The embroidery features is very easy to learn and master. The only thing I don't like is that it is a little cumbersome to have to switch out the embroidery hardware between sewing items. I haven't tested this machine with material other than standard quilting cotton, but so far ... I am happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: KatieC

customer_reviews.title: you get little or no results from customer service
customer_reviews.text: Instructional CD ROM machine operation for SE 600 was not in package. I have tried since november 23rd and got a design CD but not the CD with instructions for machine operation and spent half an hour waiting for customer service and gave up waiting on the phone. I sent in serial number proof of purchase and all required information ut no CD ROM instruction disk.
customer_reviews.author: arlene

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time user and this machine was so easy to learn. It only took a few minutes before I started my first project. There’s tons of 4x4 embroidery files to download so opportunities are endless. I sometimes wish that I would be able to embroider bigger pieces but I’m still very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Auto Threading Is The Cheese
customer_reviews.text: I can't see very well anymore, the auto threading is wonderful! YAY!
customer_reviews.author: Gazmuth

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use!! What was difficult at first was that i didnt need the circular piece that goes by the thread roll. It was pulling too tight and ripping holes in my shirt. But from there it was perfect!! Cant wait to see what else i can create!
customer_reviews.author: Joann Cody

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoying this machine
customer_reviews.text: It took a little time to get used to this machine because I’d never had a computerized machine before. However, now that I’m getting used to it, I really like it! I still need to find the time to explore all the features, but that probably won’t be until winter, it’s too busy right now.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Hall

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love ! My machine I’ve had it for about a month or 2 now and it’s great my only complaint is that just lately my foot pedal seem to not be working right, I have to wiggle to cord or I’d have to use the automatic sewing button to sew, I’ll figure it out though. Other than that great machine. ALSO I’ve used it with singer attachments such as the walking foot and other feet it works perfectly fine with them.
customer_reviews.author: Davaul Cason

customer_reviews.title: Brother SE 600
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful sewing, and embroidery machine !! I had a Brother SE 400, and this is an upgrade. I wore out the SE 400, and hope to have even more years from this one....
customer_reviews.author: Florence Jones

customer_reviews.title: Worst sewing machine I ever used
customer_reviews.text: This may be the worst sewing machine I have ever used. I have been showing for over 50 years. It is loud clunky and feels very cheaply made. I would not recommend this to anyone or any other brother machine.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The only think I don’t like is the work area for quilting. It’s doable but a larger work area would be perfect. For everything else this machine works well but it’s a bit of work on that small area for quilting.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mcclean

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! Needed it quick for a job, and it came and was easy to set up and get started. So many features, and I haven’t even got to use them all yet. Excited to try my hand at embroidering on this machine
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G.

customer_reviews.title: It's a good machine too start with
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my girlfriend. I havent seen her since but if you need a patch or ur company logo on your shirt she had you covered
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Not worth for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I got this machine, not a single time I run the embroidery is smooth. Threat keeps getting caught, doesn’t matter how i tried to adjust it. The part to help putting on the thread to the needle never works. USB cannot be read often. I had to turn on and off couple time for it to read. Newer version but not a good product like SE400
customer_reviews.author: Truc Pham

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine so much. SO many features, it's a great machine for the intermediate sewer looking to become advanced.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to get serviced
customer_reviews.text: I liked the sewing machine very much unfortunately after seven months the bobbin winder stopped working, I contacted the service center first apparently I was dealing with Canada who offered to replaced but I am in the US. They told me to go to an authorized service center but there isn’t one within 50 miles. I can’t find a solution to the issue or I’d fix it myself.
customer_reviews.author: dennis mullins

customer_reviews.title: Freezing up not accepting download
customer_reviews.text: It's not letting me show the downloaded on the machine, and it freezes up, My daughter help me downloaded to the usb and it's not showing what she downloaded. It's not the usb it's the embroidery machine.
customer_reviews.author: Nilda Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the sewing machines this one works the best and I am very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn.
customer_reviews.text: First sewing machine I have ever owned, teaching myself how to sew, so if i can any one can. The embroidery part is also fun, alot of errors but who cares just have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Broken after one week
customer_reviews.text: I only had this machine for 1 week when the automatic threader stopped working. I was willing to accept it and continue using the machine, however 2 weeks after that the bobbing stopped working. The machine no longer created a thread after 3 weeks of purchase. I was able to send the machine back, however I haven’t received a refund or a replacement just yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tinquilla Burgin

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding machine
customer_reviews.text: Extremely versatile machine. Appears to be well thought out and engineered. VERY well written owners manual/instruction book. So simple even a cave man could do it...oh,wait...that tag line's already taken...
customer_reviews.author: ÜberGoober

customer_reviews.title: Monogram software does not download on Macs
customer_reviews.text: I like my machine but I took off a star because I bought the monogram package and the software wouldn’t download to my Mac...luckily my boyfriend has a dell computer but it’s pretty inconvenient I’m new to the machine and still have a lot to learn but besides that set back the machine is a very good machine
customer_reviews.author: Leah LaGrange

customer_reviews.title: Brother: A reliable old friend.
customer_reviews.text: A perfect gift, mom is very happy so far with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners and up
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the embroidery feature but an confident leaving a positive review. If you read the included manual, and make sure you're using the right needle/thread combo for the fabric-the machine works easy peasy. There is even a guide in the book that tells you which threads/needle work for what materials/project
customer_reviews.author: Leesha

customer_reviews.title: Must have! Keep it in a good place!
customer_reviews.text: Love love this machine ❤! Wish that the girls grandmother didn't steal the foot pedal. Because she's mad that she doesn't have one.
customer_reviews.author: [BRANDISKYES]

customer_reviews.title: self threads
customer_reviews.text: sews as well a embroiders..... self threads....self cuts...and different speeds to use as well as 1 touch push button back stitch.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Cooper

customer_reviews.title: You’re gonna fall in love with this machine
customer_reviews.text: Listen!! De best purchase I’ve ever made!! Bought this item for personal use but when I saw what this machine is capable of, I’m definitely gonna start my sewing business with this. It’s so easy to use that I didn’t need to read the manual (if you’re a beginner please read the manual lol) . I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Maybest_

customer_reviews.title: First Time Trying Machine Embroidery
customer_reviews.text: The sewing machine is wonderful!!! It's fun and easy to use. I've made a shirt, sleep sacks for my grandson, a duffel bag and embroidered his name on it! Great for big projects or fixing a hem, I highly recommend this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So loving this machine!
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 SE400 machines and decided to upgrade to the newer version. So glad I did! Still the same great ease of use, essentially all the same functions but upgraded, faster, quieter, better. The screen seals the deal! So much better. So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Black

product_meta.title: Brother SE600 Sewing and Embroidery Machine, 80 Designs, 103 Built-In Stitches, Computerized, 4" x 4" Hoop Area, 3.2" LCD Touchscreen Display, 7 Included Feet
product_meta.description:
The Brother SE600 two-in-one sewing and embroidery machines allows you to bring creativity to life with ease. This 4” x 4” embroidery machine is packed with enhanced technology and multiple customizable features that streamline your sewing and embroidery. This computerized sewing and embroidery machine allows you to view embroidery designs in full color on the large 3.7"" Sew Smart color LCD touchscreen display and preview your design edits on the screen before stitching. This machine also comes with expanded embroidery design-editing features, including the ability to change individual thread colors, place lettering in an arc, move designs on the touchscreen display with the touch of a finger, and much more.

The SE600 has additional built-in features to simplify the design process. You can choose from 80 fresh and inspiring embroidery designs or import your own designs through the USB port. The sewing features include 103 versatile built-in sewing stitches, needle up/down and variable speed controls, and a drop feed for creative free-motion sewing. The expanded 6.4""(W) x 4.1""(H) needle-to-arm workspace allows more room for folding quilts and bulkier projects to the right of the needle for easier sewing.

The Brother SE600 computerized sewing and embroidery machine includes everything you need to get started on professional-looking projects. Included in the box are 7 quick-change sewing feet: spring action zigzag, buttonhole, overcasting, monogramming, zipper, blind stitch, and button sewing feet. The spring action zigzag foot is designed with a longer foot to provide smoother fabric feeding in combination with the longer 7-point feed dogs. The SE600 also comes backed by a 25-year limited warranty with free technical phone support for the life of the product.
feature_bullets: 80 Built-in designs: The SE600 comes with 80 Built-in designs and 6 embroidery lettering fonts for personalizing your projects

Automatic needle threader and drop-in top bobbin: This sewing and embroidery combo machine includes an automatic needle threader that perfectly pushes thread through the needle and a convenient, jam resistant drop-in top bobbin
103 Built-in sewing stitches: This machine features 103 sewing stitches including 10 styles of auto-size buttonholes. Maximum Sewing Speed (Stitches per minute)- 710
Large color touchscreen: The Brother SE600 computerized sewing and embroidery machine features a large 3.2" LCD color touchscreen allowing you to preview your designs before stitching
4" X 4" Embroidery field: This computerized combo machine is built with a 4" x 4" Embroidery field with an included hoop, embroidery arm and 7 sewing feet
